CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Families}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total technology adoption rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Elderly Population}.

VE.Q: What is Rural Communities's Technology Adoption Rate in 2005?
VE.A: Rural Communities's technology adoption rate in 2005 is {34.85} %.

VE.Q: What is Elderly Population's Technology Adoption Rate in 2005?
VE.A: Elderly Population's technology adoption rate in 2005 is {4.17} %.

VE.Q: What is Working Professionals's Technology Adoption Rate in 2003?
VE.A: Working Professionals's technology adoption rate in 2003 is {29.10} %.

VE.Q: What are the technology adoption rate of Urban Dwellers, Families, and Young Adults in 2000?
VE.A: Urban Dwellers's technology adoption rate is {21.78} %, Families's technology adoption rate is {27.74} %, Young Adults's technology adoption rate is {25.99} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Technology Adoption Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total technology adoption rate is {119.17} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Technology Adoption Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total technology adoption rate is {177.26} %.

SC.A: The average height of Rural Communities's technology adoption rate area is {27.51} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Urban Dwellers's Technology Adoption Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Urban Dwellers's technology adoption rate area is {24.10} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Elderly Population's Technology Adoption Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Elderly Population's technology adoption rate area is {13.07} %.

SC.A: The average height of Families's technology adoption rate area is {32.23} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate fall between 139 and 154 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {148.71} % in {2001}, total value was {143.93} % in {1999}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate exceed 157 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {159.44} % in {2003}, total value was {173.11} % in {2005}, total value was {177.26} % in {2004}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Technology Adoption Rate go below 136 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {119.17} % in {1996}, total value was {132.39} % in {1998}, total value was {123.36} % in {1997}.

NC.Q: Was the total Technology Adoption Rate in 2001 higher or lower than in 2002?
NC.A: The total technology adoption rate in {2001} was {lower} than in {2002}.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2003, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 1999 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between {2000} and {2003} was {lower} than between {1999} and {2004}.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2004, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 1998 and 2001?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between {1998} and {2004} was {higher} than between {1998} and {2001}.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2002, was the average total Technology Adoption Rate higher or lower than between 1996 and 2005?
NC.A: The average total technology adoption rate between {2000} and {2002} was {higher} than between {1996} and {2005}.
